solution_line_template: Divide the remaining miles of the trip by the miles per gallon her car gets. {trip_miles} miles / {miles_per_gallon} miles/gallon = <<{trip_miles}/{miles_per_gallon}={gallons_for_trip}>>{gallons_for_trip} gallons

Subtract the gallons used for the trip from the size of her gas tank. {tank_capacity} gallons - {gallons_for_trip} gallons = <<{tank_capacity}-{gallons_for_trip}={remaining_gallons}>>{remaining_gallons} gallons

Multiply the remaining number of gallons by the car's gas mileage. {remaining_gallons} gallons x {miles_per_gallon} miles/gallon = <<{remaining_gallons}*{miles_per_gallon}={extra_miles_after_home}>>{extra_miles_after_home} miles
